软件包 cn.org.rapid_framework.generator.util

接口摘要
PropertyPlaceholderHelper.PlaceholderResolver Strategy interface used to resolve replacement values for placeholders contained in Strings.
 

类摘要
AntPathMatcher PathMatcher implementation for Ant-style path patterns.
ArrayHelper  
BeanHelper  
ClassHelper  
DateHelper  
DBHelper  
FileHelper  
FreemarkerHelper  
GLogger  
Inflector API for performing inflections (pluralization, singularization, and so on) on various strings.
IOHelper  
ListHashtable  
PatternMatchHelper Utility methods for simple pattern matching, in particular for Spring's typical "xxx*", "*xxx" and "*xxx*" pattern styles.
PropertiesHelper  
PropertyPlaceholderHelper copy from springframework Utility class for working with Strings that have placeholder values in them.
PropertyPlaceholderHelper.PropertyPlaceholderConfigurerResolver  
ResourceHelper Utility methods for resolving resource locations to files in the file system.
SqlExecutorHelper
